Package com.xebisco.yield

Class ComponentBehavior

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ComponentBehavior
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behavior, Disposable, Renderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Rectangle
public abstract class ComponentBehavior extends Object implements Behavior, Renderable
ComponentBehavior is an abstract class that implements the Behavior and Renderable interfaces. This the class is declared as abstract. This means that it cannot be instantiated. It is only meant to be extended by other classes
